block.wilderwild.maple_wall_hanging_sign: Placa suspensa de parede de bordo

block.wilderwild.stripped_hollowed_pale_: Tronco de carvalho pálido oco descascado

block.wilderwild.mossy_mud_brick_wall: Parede de tijolos de barro com musgo

item.wilderwild.light_gray_firefly_bottl: Vaga-lume cinza claro em uma garrafa

subtitles.entity.ostrich.inbred.idle.boc: Avestruz consanguíneo acha que é uma galinha
subtitles.entity.ostrich.inbred.step: Avestruz consanguíneo amassa os pés moles
subtitles.entity.ostrich.inbred.beak.swi: Pescoço estalado e imenso do Avestruz consanguíneo balança de forma provocante
death.attack.ostrich: %1$s foi picado até a morte por %2$s
death.attack.ostrich.item: %1$s foi picado até a morte por %2$s com %3$s
option.wilderwild.component.title: Opções do Wilder Wild
tooltip.wilderwild.billboard_tendrils:
Whether Hanging Tendrils should use a billboard model
(Flat plane that points at the camera.)
tooltip.wilderwild.extra_magma_particles: Makes extra particles will spawn when Fire is above Magma.
tooltip.wilderwild.soul_fire_sounds: Makes Soul Fire have unique ambient sounds.
tooltip.wilderwild.tendrils_carry_events:
Whether Hanging Tendrils should retransmit game event context.
Will allow Sculk Shriekers to be set off.
tooltip.wilderwild.cactus_placement:
Whether Cacti can be placed next to other blocks.
If you have Cactus farms, it is recommended you disable this.
tooltip.wilderwild.frosted_ice_cracking: Whether Frosted Ice will spawn break particles and play a quiet break sound upon cracking.
tooltip.wilderwild.thick_big_fungus_grow: Whether the thick variant of Big Fungi found in the Nether can be grown from Fungus or not.
tooltip.wilderwild.log_hollowing:
Whether Logs can be hollowed with axes.
May help with mod compatability.
tooltip.wilderwild.reach_boost_beacon: Whether Beacons should contain the Reach Boost effect.
tooltip.wilderwild.mesoglea_fluid: Whether Mesoglea will render like a liquid when waterlogged.
tooltip.wilderwild.mesoglea_bubble_colum: Whether Mesoglea will be able to work as/with Bubble Columns.
tooltip.wilderwild.pollen_particles:
Whether Pollen particles should spawn.
Can help performance on low-end devices.
tooltip.wilderwild.snowlog_walls: Whether Fences, Fence Gates, and Walls can be Snowlogged.
tooltip.wilderwild.natural_snowlogging: Whether Snowlogging will occur during worldgen and while snowing.
tooltip.wilderwild.stone_chest: Contains options for the Stone Chest.
tooltip.wilderwild.stone_chest_timer:
Determines how long the stone chest will stay open.
This is a percentage.
tooltip.wilderwild.termites_only_eat_nat:
Whether blocks placed by the player won't be eaten by Termites.
Disable if this causes issues, as this adds a new property to some blocks.
tooltip.wilderwild.max_termite_distance: Controls how many blocks away from their Mound Termites can survive.
tooltip.wilderwild.max_natural_termite_d:
Controls how many blocks away from their Mound Termites can survive
when the Mound was generated naturally.
tooltip.wilderwild.block_sounds: Contains options that override block sounds.
tooltip.wilderwild.cactus_sounds: Whether Cactus sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.clay_sounds: Whether Clay sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.coarse_dirt_sounds: Whether Coarse Dirt sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.dead_bush_sounds: Whether Dead Bush sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.flower_sounds: Whether Flower sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.gravel_sounds: Whether Gravel sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.ice_sounds: Whether Ice sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.frosted_ice_sounds: Whether Frosted Ice sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.leaf_sounds: Whether Leaf sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.lily_pad_sounds: Whether Lily Pad sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.melon_sounds: Whether Melon-like sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.magma_sounds: Whether Magma sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.mushroom_block_sounds: Whether Mushroom Block sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.podzol_sounds: Whether Podzol sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.sapling_sounds: Whether Sapling sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.sugar_cane_sounds: Whether Sugar Cane sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.reinforced_deepslate_: Whether Reinforced Deepslate sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.wither_rose_sounds: Whether Wither Rose sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.sandstone_sounds: Whether Sandstone sounds should be overridden.
tooltip.wilderwild.keyframe_allay_dance:
Whether the Allay's dancing animation should
be replaced with a keyframe-based version.
tooltip.wilderwild.reach_affects_attack:
Whether the Reach Boost effect will
impact the Player's attack range.
tooltip.wilderwild.anger_loop_sound: Whether Endermen will start an anger sound loop when their target is set.
tooltip.wilderwild.moving_stare_sound:
Whether Enderman stare sounds will move
with the Enderman and able to be stopped early.
tooltip.wilderwild.jellyfish_hiding:
Whether naturally-spawned Jellyfish should be able
to vanish inside Mesoglea/Nematocyst.
tooltip.wilderwild.jellyfish_tentacles: Controls the amount of tentacles Jellyfish have.
tooltip.wilderwild.lightning_scorches_sa: Whether Lightning Bolts should scorch Sand blocks upon striking.
tooltip.wilderwild.lightning_block_parti: Whether Lightning Bolts should spawn a stream of block particles upon striking.
tooltip.wilderwild.lightning_smoke_parti: Whether Lightning Bolts should spawn smoke particles upon striking.
tooltip.wilderwild.allow_ostrich_attack: Whether the Ostrich's peck attack can be used.
tooltip.wilderwild.scorched_in_trial_cha: Whether Scorched will have spawners in Trial Chambers.
tooltip.wilderwild.leashed_tumbleweed: Whether Tumbleweed are able to be leashed.
tooltip.wilderwild.tumbleweed_rotates_to:
When enabled, Tumbleweed will rotate in the direction
it's moving instead of spinning towards it.
tooltip.wilderwild.unpassable_rail: Allows all mob entities to walk over rails instead of being unable to pass it.
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_attacks_immedi: Whether the Warden should attack entities on collision.
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_custom_tendril:
Vanilla: Warden's tendrils only rotate about a single axis.
Improved: Warden's tendrils rotate about all axes, improving visibility from all angles.
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_death_animatio: Whether the Warden should have an animation when it dies.
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_emerges_from_c: Makes the Warden play the emerging animation when spawned via command.
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_emerges_from_e: Makes the Warden play the emerging animation when spawned via spawn egg.
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_swims: Whether the Warden should be able to swim.
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_swim_animation:
Whether the Warden should §ovisually §rswim.
§c(WARNING: Disabling this will cause the warden to appear to 
phase through blocks when swimming through one block tall gaps. 
Please only disable this if it causes incompatibilities.)
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_bedrock_sniff:
Bedrock: Warden's head bobs thrice during the sniff animation
Java: Warden's head bobs twice in the sniff animation
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_improved_dig: Whether the Warden should use a slightly improved dig animation.
tooltip.wilderwild.warden_improved_emerg: Whether the Warden should use a slightly improved emerge animation.
tooltip.wilderwild.projectile_break_part:
Whether projectiles like Arrows or Tridents
should emit block breaking particles when colliding.
tooltip.wilderwild.projectile_landing_so: Contains toggles for thrown projectile landing sounds.
tooltip.wilderwild.snowball_landing_soun: Whether Snowballs should make a unique sound upon landing.
tooltip.wilderwild.egg_landing_sounds: Whether Eggs should make a unique sound upon landing.
tooltip.wilderwild.ender_pearl_landing_s: Whether Ender Pearls should make a unique sound upon landing.
tooltip.wilderwild.potion_landing_sounds:
Whether Potions should make unique sounds upon landing.
(Sounds vary based on potion type and effect.)
tooltip.wilderwild.restrict_instrument_s: Whether instruments, such as the Goat Horn, should stop their sound when the user releases the mouse button
tooltip.wilderwild.algae_generation: Whether Algae is placed in worldgen.
tooltip.wilderwild.beta_beaches:
Enables Beaches near water that generate independent of the biome,
mirroring the beaches that existed in Minecraft Beta.
tooltip.wilderwild.bush_generation: Whether worldgen should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's Bush generation.
tooltip.wilderwild.cactus_generation: Whether worldgen should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's Cactus generation.
tooltip.wilderwild.dying_trees: Whether Dying Trees should generate in the world.
tooltip.wilderwild.fallen_trees: Whether Fallen Trees will generate naturally.
tooltip.wilderwild.flower_generation: Whether worldgen should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's Flower generation.
tooltip.wilderwild.grass_generation: Whether worldgen should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's Grass generation.
tooltip.wilderwild.mushroom_generation: Whether worldgen should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's Mushroom generation.
tooltip.wilderwild.nether_geyser_generat: Whether Geysers should naturally generate in the Nether.
tooltip.wilderwild.add_stone_chests: Whether Ancient Cities will use Stone Chests instead of Chests instead of regular Chests.
tooltip.wilderwild.decay_trail_ruins: Whether Trail Ruins can generate with Mossy and Cracked Mud Bricks.
tooltip.wilderwild.new_desert_villages: Whether Desert Villages will generate with the Palm wood set.
tooltip.wilderwild.new_witch_huts: Whether Witch Huts should use a Cypress and Oak wood set.
tooltip.wilderwild.snapped_trees: Whether Snapped Trees will generate naturally.
tooltip.wilderwild.snow_below_trees: Whether worldgen should place snow and ice below leaves or not.
tooltip.wilderwild.snow_under_mountains:
Whether snow should generate below mountains.
This may not always work, and is experimental.
tooltip.wilderwild.surface_decoration:
Whether Surface Decorators are placed in worldgen.
This includes things like Coarse Dirt and Packed Mud paths.
tooltip.wilderwild.surface_transitions: Whether unique biome surfaces should fizzle out in worldgen.
tooltip.wilderwild.termite_generation: Whether Termite Mounds are placed in worldgen.
tooltip.wilderwild.tree_generation: Whether worldgen should use our custom tree types or the Vanilla tree types.
tooltip.wilderwild.tumbleweed_generation: Whether Tumbleweed are placed in worldgen.
tooltip.wilderwild.biome_placement: Contains options that change where biomes are placed into the world.
tooltip.wilderwild.modify_jungle_placeme:
Whether Jungles should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's placement.
Wilder Wild's placement replaces Deserts and Badlands with Jungles in humid areas.
tooltip.wilderwild.modify_mangrove_swamp:
Whether Mangrove Swamps should useWilder Wild's or Vanilla's placement.
Wilder Wild's placement doesn't place Mangrove Swamps in areas with low humidity.
tooltip.wilderwild.modify_swamp_placemen:
Whether Swamps should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's placement.
Wilder Wild's placement doesn't place Swamps in areas with low humidity.
tooltip.wilderwild.modify_windswept_sava:
Whether Windswept Savannas should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's placement.
Wilder Wild's placement reduces the number of Windswept Savannas in cool areas.
tooltip.wilderwild.modify_cherry_grove_p:
Whether Cherry Groves should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's placement.
Wilder Wild's placement allows Cherry Groves to also generate near Rivers.
tooltip.wilderwild.modify_stony_shore_pl:
Whether Stony Shores should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's placement.
Wilder Wild's placement replaces Beaches with Stony Shores when near Taigas.
tooltip.wilderwild.biome_generation: Contains options that dictate whether Wilder Wild's biomes should generate or not.
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_old_growth_b: Whether Old Growth Birch Taigas should generate.
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_sparse_birch: Whether Sparse Birch Jungles should generate.
option.wilderwild.generate_snowy_old_gro: Generate Snowy Old Growth Pine Taigas
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_snowy_old_gr: Whether Snowy Old Growth Pine Taigas should generate.
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_old_growth_d: Whether Old Growth Dark Forests should generate.
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_dark_birch_f: Whether Dark Birch Forests should generate.
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_semi_birch_f: Whether Semi Birch Forests should generate.
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_snowy_dying_: Whether Snowy Dying Forests should generate.
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_dying_mixed_: Whether Dying Mixed Forests should generate.
tooltip.wilderwild.generate_snowy_dying_: Whether Snowy Dying Mixed Forests should generate.
tooltip.wilderwild.deep_dark_ambience: Whether to use new ambient sounds in the Deep Dark biome.
tooltip.wilderwild.deep_dark_fog: Whether fog in the Deep Dark biome will be pitch black.
tooltip.wilderwild.dripstone_caves_ambie: Whether to use new ambient sounds in the Dripstone Caves biome.
tooltip.wilderwild.lush_caves_ambience: Whether to use new ambient sounds in the Lush Caves biome.
tooltip.wilderwild.frozen_caves_ambience: Whether to use new ambient sounds in the Frozen Caves biome.
tooltip.wilderwild.frozen_caves_fog: Whether fog in the Frozen Caves biome will be pitch black.
tooltip.wilderwild.mesoglea_caves_ambien: Whether to use new ambient sounds in the Mesoglea Caves biome.
tooltip.wilderwild.mesoglea_caves_fog: Whether fog in the Mesoglea Caves biome will be pitch black.
tooltip.wilderwild.magmatic_caves_ambien: Whether to use new ambient sounds in the Magmatic Caves biome.
tooltip.wilderwild.magmatic_caves_fog: Whether fog in the Magmatic Caves biome will be pitch black.
tooltip.wilderwild.magmatic_caves_partic: Whether Smoke particles will spawn in the Magmatic Caves biome.
tooltip.wilderwild.item_cooldowns_save:
Whether item cooldowns will save instead of being
cleared upon switching dimensions or rejoining a world.
tooltip.wilderwild.modify_advancements:
Whether advancements should contain Wilder Wild's criteria.
Disable this if it causes compatability issues.
tooltip.wilderwild.vegetation_colors: Contains options that change the foliage colors of biomes.
tooltip.wilderwild.badlands_foliage: Whether Badlands biomes should use a dark green color for their foliage.
tooltip.wilderwild.water_colors: Contains options that change the water colors of biomes to match their temperature.
tooltip.wilderwild.frozen_water: Whether Frozen and Icy biomes should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's water colors.
tooltip.wilderwild.snowy_water: Whether Snowy biomes should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's water colors.
tooltip.wilderwild.lukewarm_water: Whether Lukewarm biomes should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's water colors.
tooltip.wilderwild.hot_water: Whether Hot biomes should use Wilder Wild's or Vanilla's water colors.
tooltip.wilderwild.wilder_forest_music: Whether to use new music in some Forest-like biomes.
tooltip.wilderwild.cloud_movement: Whether Clouds should move alongside Wind.
tooltip.wilderwild.firework_wind_movemen:
Controls the intensity of wind on Firework Rockets.
This is a percentage.
tooltip.wilderwild.particle_wind_movemen:
Controls the intensity of wind on affected particles.
This is a percentage.
tooltip.wilderwild.wind_particle_frequen:
The frequency at which Wind particles should spawn.
More intense Wind leads to more particles.
This is a percentage.
tooltip.wilderwild.wind_particle_spawn_a: The number of times per tick a Wind Particle will attempt to spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.wind_disturbance_part:
Whether Wind particles caused by Wind Disturbances should spawn.
Wind Disturbances are caused by things like Breezes and Wind Charges.

The frequency at which Wind Disturbance particles should spawn.
More intense Wind Disturbances lead to more particles.
This is a percentage.
The number of times per tick a Wind Disturbance Particle will attempt to spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.oak_leaf_particles: How frequently Oak Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.spruce_leaf_particles: How frequently Spruce Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.birch_leaf_particles: How frequently Birch Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.jungle_leaf_particles: How frequently Jungle Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.acacia_leaf_particles: How frequently Acacia Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.dark_oak_leaf_particl: How frequently Dark Oak Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.pale_oak_leaf_particl: How frequently Pale Oak Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.mangrove_leaf_particl: How frequently Mangrove Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.cherry_leaf_particles:
How frequently Cherry Leaf particles should spawn.
Note that this will only control Wilder Wild's additional leaf particles. Not vanilla's.
tooltip.wilderwild.azalea_leaf_particles: How frequently Azalea Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.flowering_azalea_leaf: How frequently Flowering Azalea Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.baobab_leaf_particles: How frequently Baobab Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.cypress_leaf_particle: How frequently Cypress Leaf particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.palm_frond_particles: How frequently Palm Frond particles should spawn.
tooltip.wilderwild.maple_leaf_particles: How frequently Maple Leaf particles should spawn.
wilderwild.advancements.husbandry.firefl: Capture um vagalume em uma garrafa
commands.sculkspread.success: Espalhou Sculk em %s, %s, %s com carga de %s.
